Class ConstantPoolControl

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.javabox.control.ConstantPoolControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Control
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassReferenceControl
public class ConstantPoolControl extends Object implements Control
A JavaBox Control that restricts the what's allowed to appear in the constant pool.

This class inspects all constant pool entries, passing them to checkPoolEntry() for validation. That method delegates to the appropriate type-specific method; the type-specific methods in this class do not throw any exceptions, so ConstantPoolControl itself does not disallow anything. Subclasses should overrided as needed.

  • Method Details

    • modifyBytecode

      public byte[] modifyBytecode(ClassDesc name, byte[] bytes)
      Description copied from interface: Control
      Apply this control to the given class which was generated from a script.

      The default implementation in Control just returns bytecode.

      Specified by:
      modifyBytecode in interface Control
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the class being added
      bytes - the Java bytecode of the class being added
      Returns:
      replacement java bytecode; must not be null

    • checkPoolEntry

      protected void checkPoolEntry(PoolEntry entry)
      Validate a constant pool entry.

      The implementation in ConstantPoolControl just delegates to the corresponding type-specific validation method.

      Throws:
      IllegalPoolEntryException - if a disallowed symbolic reference is detected
